description:
Add is a descendant of a family that researched Nasods and was exterminated after being caught researching their forbidden secrets.
Add fell into an Ancient Library while escaping and was trapped all alone. He spent his time reading books about Nasods and waited for the day he could escape. With his vast knowledge, Add eventually invented the Nasod Dynamo using the parts from broken down Nasods found inside the library. Using the weapon`s power, he escaped from the collapsing library. However, being trapped alone for so long left Add insane along with an obsession to find rare Nasod codes.
While traveling to look for more Nasod schematics, he found out that their race no longer existed. The library where Add had lived in distorted time inside and sent him far into the future. Thus, Add manipulateed Wally in order to gain strength and found a way to get back to the past. That was until Add found traces of http://anidb.net/ch87459 [Eve] from the corrupted Nasod King.
Add is technically an enemy of the El Search Party, but officially joins the main cast after the story in Ancient Waterway. His real name is Edward Grenore.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Add
